message: Let's be fair, I'll take a bit more
My turn. This is a bit more in my favor now, but still allows you to get more than you would if you reject and I get my way next round.
I'll meet you halfway between my first offer and your last one
Time is running out! This is my final offer. Accept this and we both walk away with something.
You said that was your final offer, but I'm not buying it. This is my new proposal
